title: 'Like a dad hugging his son' - Alisson & Robertson on Klopp
body_text:
'Like a dad hugging his son' - Alisson & Robertson on Klopp
Liverpool players Andy Robertson and Alisson Becker talk about their experience of being managed by Jurgen Klopp and his "special" hugs which helped create a positive atmosphere at the club.
Watch on BBC iPlayer: How to win the Champions League - Liverpool 2019
